seo.title: Tradeshow & Expo Event App | Micepad
seo.description: Maximize exhibitor ROI and attendee engagement at tradeshows with Micepad. Interactive floor maps, lead capture, and exhibitor profiles.

hero.headline: Event App for Tradeshows & Expos
hero.subheadline: Connect exhibitors with qualified leads through interactive floor maps and lead capture

benefits.title: Interactive Floor Maps
benefits.description: Help attendees navigate and find exhibitors with searchable maps.

benefits.title: Lead Capture
benefits.description: Exhibitors scan badges and capture leads directly in the app.

benefits.title: Exhibitor Profiles
benefits.description: Showcase exhibitors with products, videos, and contact info.

benefits.title: Meeting Scheduler
benefits.description: Attendees book meetings with exhibitors in advance.

faq.question: Can exhibitors access their leads in real-time?
faq.answer: Yes, exhibitors get instant access to scanned leads with notes and export options.

faq.question: Do you support indoor wayfinding?
faq.answer: Yes, our interactive maps support booth locations, amenities, and turn-by-turn navigation.
